column4: Hi All...Im trying to install samba and everytime I try to compile by running the script autogen.sh I get the error: " need autoconf 2.53 or later to build samba from SVN". Anybody who knows how to resolve this please ping me. Thanks
any particular reason why you're compiling it instead of grabbing it from the ubuntu repositories?
okays. Well, do you have autoconf installed? The latest version in hardy appears to be 2.61, so if you install it you should be okay. Try sudo apt-get install autoconf and see :)
well, you said you needed autoconf, which is installed by the autoconf package. build-essential is just generally a Good Idea if you're going to be compiling your own stuff.
